text.section:
The powers granted by this subtitle are:
Supplemental to the powers granted by any general, special, or local law; and
Not restricted by any debt or tax rate limitation in any general law, local law, or municipal charter.

Any municipality may engage in the development of any sewerage facility under this subtitle regardless of any general, special, or local law that:
Provides for the development of similar facilities;
Requires approval by the voters of any municipality for the development of the sewerage facility; or
Contains any other requirements, restrictions, limitations, or provisions regarding the development of the sewerage facility.
If any provision of this subtitle is inconsistent with any general, special, or local law, the provision of this subtitle controls.
